pr_title: item charges: update amulet of chemistry charges when creating less than 4-dose potions

timeline.message:
Update runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/itemcharges/ItemChargePlugin.java

Removed capturing braces, so we pick up the number of charges and not the number of doses

Co-authored-by: Hydrox <ikada@protonmail.ch>

Update runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/itemcharges/ItemChargePlugin.java

No reason to capture anything

Co-authored-by: Hydrox <ikada@protonmail.ch>
item charges: added test cases for amulet of chemistry
